name: Microprocessor Design Notes
tagline: Group Repo and Website for the design of a microprocessor for ECG 604/CPE 404 in Verilog, with implementation on an FPGA
body:
### About Project.
This our project and homework repository for ECG 604 / CPE 404. We are tasked to design a simple toy microprocessor which includes: 

- An Assembler in C 
- Implementation through an FPGA

with architecture features including:
- Two Level Cache
- Two Issue SS
- Floating Point Unit 
- Branch Prediction
and more 

Our processor is based on a subset of the MIPS ISA, with support of the MIPS CoProc 1 subset support for floating point 

### Blog Updates
Check each of our individual branches to see our current updates and wiki changes, as well as worklogs

### Authors
Ronobir Das (@RonobirDas) and Jonathan Young (@littlecheldon) 

### Other important websites: 
* [UNLV IEEE website](http://unlvieee.me)

* [General Digital Design Help](http://rebelsites.unlv.edu/~mookherj)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
